attributes.additional_details: It's a beautiful nature park by the coast in Holyhead Anglesey which is home to various birds , animals and flora  some of which are endangered . Many locals and holiday makers use the nature park and to lose this park when we should be increasing areas of natural beauty would be a step in the wrong direction .
attributes.background: Stop Land and Lakes/ Bluestone  development of a holiday resort on land at Penrhos Nature Park ,Holyhead

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the relevant local authority and Welsh Government are responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
